notes.name: Will Smith
notes.content: Money and success don’t change people; they merely amplify what is already there.

notes.name: John Lennon
notes.content: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.

notes.name: Thomas A. Edison
notes.content: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
